column4: would somebody please offer me help playing avi files with totem?   i've done the restricted formats tutorial off the wiki and still cannot play these files
i'd rather fix the underlying issue vs. trying different apps...  :-(
there must be some reason why it is not working, right?
sure you did everything in RestrictedFormats? seems to work for most other people
yes.... because i could play this same movie file yesterday
i even went back through and re-did the steps
uh *stupid idea* perhaps something screwed up the packages, try reinstall them? :S
would installing totem-xine package mess up something?
i think thats where it went wrong
it might? i mean i guess it is possible?
anyways, i doubt i'll be able to help you, i'm basically a beginner
does the restrictedformats tutorial include Xvid encoded videos??
